title: Midnight
lyrics:
Oh, oh-oh, oh-oh, oh, oh-oh
Oh, oh-oh, oh
You're the sky, lightning strikes
More than once, more than twice
You're the kiss I won't forget
Lights me up

I've never found a love like this



I can't stand leaving you, no

I can't stand leaving you, no

My feels know what's up for you, no

I can't stand still



Baby, we can run to midnight, oh

You can turn the stars so bright

Running to midnight, oh

You make me feel I'm doing something right

Now, is it calling for us?

I can see it in your eyes

Running to midnight, oh

Dancing in its light tonight



Oh, oh-oh, oh-oh, oh, oh-oh

I'm the lust in your life

Couldn't break if we tried

I'm the smile on your face

Lights you up

We've never found a love like this



I can't stand leaving you, no

I can't stand leaving you, no

I can't stand leaving you, no

I can't stand



Baby, we can run to midnight, oh

You can turn the stars so bright

Running to midnight, oh

You make me feel I'm doing something right

I waited so long for us

That we're gon' tell 'em when you are mine

Running to midnight, oh

Dancing in its light tonight, oh



Ooooh, is it right to look?

Right to look, right to look?

I can't stand leaving you, no (Ooh)

I can't stand leaving you, no (Ooh)

Is it right to look? (I can't stand leaving you, no)

Right to look, right to look? (I can't stand leaving you, no)

I can't stand leaving you, no

I can't stand leaving you, no



Baby, we could run to midnight, oh (Midnight)

You can turn the stars so bright

Running to midnight, oh (Midnight)

You make me feel I'm doing something right

Now, is it calling for us? (Calling for us)

I can see it in your eyes

Running to midnight, oh (Midnight)

Dancing in its light tonight, oh



Oooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, oooh, oooh, oh-oh, oh-oh

Oh, ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh

Oooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, oooh, oooh, oh-oh, oh-oh

Oh, ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh
